name: Artful Takedown
oracle_text:
Choose one or both —
• Tap target creature.
• Target creature gets -2/-4 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Dimir assassinations are choreographed like dance routines. Each challenge is anticipated and countered with graceful ease.

name: Barging Sergeant
oracle_text:
Haste
Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)
flavor_text: "Don't stop till your horns come out their back."

name: Barrier of Bones
oracle_text:
Defender
When Barrier of Bones enters the battlefield, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)
flavor_text: The Dimir rarely make statements, but when they do, the message is clear.

name: Bartizan Bats
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text:
"Bats are welcome to eat thousands of my pets. I have multitudes more that will ultimately eat the bats."
—Izoni

name: Blade Instructor
oracle_text: Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)
flavor_text: "Watch carefully. The gap between death and victory is thinner than your blade."

name: Boros Guildgate
oracle_text:
Boros Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.
flavor_text:
"The more trust breaks down, the more we must throw open the front gates."
—Aurelia

name: Boros Locket
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.
{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}, {T}, Sacrifice Boros Locket: Draw two cards.
flavor_text:
"We pass these along to our fellow soldiers to recognize deeds of valor. It won't stay with you for long."
—Alovnek, Boros guildmage

name: Burglar Rat
oracle_text: When Burglar Rat enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.
flavor_text:
"Even rats hoard their treasures. Are your precious things so different?"
—Izoni

name: Candlelight Vigil
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+2 and has vigilance.
flavor_text: Selesnya guildmages do not sleep so the rest of the Conclave can.

name: Capture Sphere
oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Enchant creature
When Capture Sphere enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

name: Centaur Peacemaker
oracle_text: When Centaur Peacemaker enters the battlefield, each player gains 4 life.
flavor_text: "Please accept this offering. I sincerely hope to leave my mace at my side."

name: Child of Night
oracle_text: Lifelink
flavor_text: No guilds—that is her rule. The House vampires unnerve her. The Combine would dissect her, the Legion burn her, the Conclave "cure" her. The shadows are all the family she needs.

name: Collar the Culprit
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with toughness 4 or greater.
flavor_text:
"Reports of Gruul rioters in four districts. Start with the big ones and work your way up."
—Libuse, Boros sergeant

name: Command the Storm
oracle_text: Command the Storm deals 5 damage to target creature.
flavor_text: In the wake of Niv-Mizzet's disappearance, Ral found himself leading the guild. He had dreamed of this day, but couldn't help feeling like a pawn in someone else's game.

name: Cosmotronic Wave
oracle_text: Cosmotronic Wave deals 1 damage to each creature your opponents control. Creatures your opponents control can't block this turn.
flavor_text: "This sort of innovation occurs when you set out to improve an electric tea kettle and misplace a decimal."

name: Crushing Canopy
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target creature with flying.
• Destroy target enchantment.
flavor_text:
"The Dimir may look all they want. We never grow tired of swatting their bugs."
—Heruj, Selesnya hierophant

name: Darkblade Agent
oracle_text: As long as you've surveilled this turn, Darkblade Agent has deathtouch and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, you draw a card."
flavor_text: "I've seen your house, and you've been a lovely, if unwitting, host. But at last it's time for farewells."

name: Dazzling Lights
oracle_text:
Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn.
Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

name: Deadly Visit
oracle_text:
Destroy target creature.
Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

name: Dead Weight
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -2/-2.
flavor_text: All things considered, his first day on patrol could have gone better.

name: Devious Cover-Up
oracle_text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard. You may shuffle up to four target cards from your graveyard into your library.
flavor_text: First, dispose of the evidence. Then dispose of your knowledge of its disposal.

name: Devkarin Dissident
oracle_text: {4}{G}: Devkarin Dissident gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "This is Mileva, in the Tenth. We've got an elf in the plaza with a chip on her shoulder. Actually, it's more of a morningstar."

name: Dimir Guildgate
oracle_text:
Dimir Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.
flavor_text:
"Every guild dreads infiltration. I should know—I've been a member of all of them."
—Lazav

name: Dimir Informant
oracle_text: When Dimir Informant enters the battlefield, surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)
flavor_text: The letters arrive, all sealed and read.

name: Dimir Locket
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.
{U/B}{U/B}{U/B}{U/B}, {T}, Sacrifice Dimir Locket: Draw two cards.
flavor_text:
"Wear this, and take your place among the shadows—wise, lethal, and unseen."
—Ivrelya, Dimir spymaster

name: Direct Current
oracle_text:
Direct Current deals 2 damage to any target.
Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)

name: Disdainful Stroke
oracle_text: Counter target spell with mana value 4 or greater.
flavor_text: "Laws apply only to those who lack the vision to see past them."

name: Douser of Lights
flavor_text: The party of Rakdos revelers cackled and capered as the thing approached. It hissed, and they jabbed their torches at it, giggling when it recoiled. Then, one by one, the torches went out—and the screaming began.

name: Erstwhile Trooper
oracle_text: Discard a creature card: Erstwhile Trooper gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
flavor_text:
"The Erstwhile—rotten of body and outmoded in dress, but unfailing in loyalty."
—Vraska

name: Fearless Halberdier
flavor_text: "I spent some time in the Legion, but I'm done taking orders all day."

name: Fire Urchin
oracle_text:
Trample
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Fire Urchin gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Rain runoff in the Smelting District is known to spontaneously burst into flame.

name: Fresh-Faced Recruit
oracle_text: As long as it's your turn, Fresh-Faced Recruit has first strike.
flavor_text:
"Hold on to your ideals. They'll be tested more than your armor or the edge of your blade."
—Tajic

name: Garrison Sergeant
oracle_text: Garrison Sergeant has double strike as long as you control a Gate.
flavor_text: In the Legion, no flagpole is merely decorative, and every ceremonial sword bears an edge.

name: Gateway Plaza
oracle_text:
Gateway Plaza enters the battlefield tapped.
When Gateway Plaza enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you pay {1}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: The Chamber of the Guildpact stands as a reminder that even the bitterest struggles can end in cooperation.

name: Generous Stray
oracle_text: When Generous Stray enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor_text: Cats place their gifts with care, so that a bare foot will step on them in the middle of the night.

name: Goblin Electromancer
oracle_text: Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
flavor_text:
"Result 752: Rapid mass redistribution.
"Result 753: Calamitous reverse synthesis.
"Result 754: Acute disarrayment."
—Izzet research notes

name: Goblin Locksmith
oracle_text: Whenever Goblin Locksmith attacks, creatures with defender can't block this turn.
flavor_text:
"He's got more finesse than most goblins. He smashes windows with his fist rather than his forehead."
—Arrester Polgar

name: Golgari Guildgate
oracle_text:
Golgari Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.
flavor_text:
"Shut the gates. In the Underrealm we will outlast the coming doom."
—Vraska

name: Golgari Locket
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.
{B/G}{B/G}{B/G}{B/G}, {T}, Sacrifice Golgari Locket: Draw two cards.
flavor_text:
"Wear it at all times. It will guide our reanimators to your corpse."
—Mazirek, kraul death priest

name: Gravitic Punch
oracle_text:
Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target player.
Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)

name: Hammer Dropper
oracle_text: Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)
flavor_text: Giants know a solid hit is one part strength, four parts leverage.

name: Healer's Hawk
oracle_text: Flying, lifelink
flavor_text: The wounded see the glow of its vials long before they see its wings diving out of the clouds.

name: Hired Poisoner
oracle_text: Deathtouch
flavor_text: "They don't even feel the cut. I'm ordering a drink in a nearby tavern before anyone notices something's wrong."

name: Hitchclaw Recluse
oracle_text: Reach
flavor_text: Nearly invisible strands of web reach far beyond its lair to alert it of the approach of prey.

name: Hunted Witness
oracle_text: When Hunted Witness dies, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token with lifelink.
flavor_text: He ferried weapons, spells, exotic animals—but his most dangerous cargo was the truth.

name: Hypothesizzle
oracle_text: Draw two cards. Then you may discard a nonland card. When you do, Hypothesizzle deals 4 damage to target creature.
flavor_text:
"It's like blowing up an arcane library in a thermobaric explosion. But in a good way."
—Bori Andon, Izzet blastseeker

name: Intrusive Packbeast
oracle_text:
Vigilance
When Intrusive Packbeast enters the battlefield, tap up to two target creatures your opponents control.
flavor_text: Good at carrying things. Really good at knocking them down.

name: Ironshell Beetle
oracle_text: When Ironshell Beetle enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor_text:
"Please don't feed the beetles."
—Promenade warning sign

name: Izzet Guildgate
oracle_text:
Izzet Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {R}.
flavor_text: Every laboratory buzzes with new experiments, each a piece of Ral's ambitious project.

name: Izzet Locket
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {U} or {R}.
{U/R}{U/R}{U/R}{U/R}, {T}, Sacrifice Izzet Locket: Draw two cards.
flavor_text:
"Remember to discharge your locket every seven hours. Unless you prefer the spontaneous aether overload, of course."
—Daxiver, Izzet electromancer

name: Kraul Foragers
oracle_text: Undergrowth — When Kraul Foragers enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each creature card in your graveyard.
flavor_text:
Feed on food, you eventually rot. Feed on rot, you live forever.
—Kraul saying

name: Kraul Raider
oracle_text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor_text: The kraul once skulked in the outskirts of Golgari society, but with Vraska's rise, they became valued forces of the Swarm.

name: Leapfrog
oracle_text: Leapfrog has flying as long as you've cast an instant or sorcery spell this turn.
flavor_text:
"Most compete for insects at street level. Some dwell near Izzet laboratories and ride the thermal updrafts."
—Yolov, Simic bioengineer

name: Ledev Guardian
oracle_text: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
flavor_text: "I've raised her since she was a pup, and she's raised me since I was a recruit."

name: Loxodon Restorer
oracle_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
When Loxodon Restorer enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.

name: Luminous Bonds
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
flavor_text:
"Article 5.8.2. Ensure proper restraint of any and all arms, legs, claws, jaws, tails, tentacles, and tendrils as appropriate."
—*Azorius Arrester Procedure*, Appendix B

name: Maniacal Rage
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't block.
flavor_text:
"They tell us the wilds are ours, then they brick them over. They can lie to our faces but not to our fists."
—Ghut Rak, Gruul guildmage

name: Maximize Altitude
oracle_text:
Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains flying until end of turn.
Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)

name: Maximize Velocity
oracle_text:
Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains haste until end of turn.
Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)

name: Mephitic Vapors
oracle_text:
All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)
flavor_text: Ravnica's safest strongholds are often neither.

name: Moodmark Painter
oracle_text: Undergrowth — When Moodmark Painter enters the battlefield, target creature gains menace and gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

name: Muse Drake
oracle_text:
Flying
When Muse Drake enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor_text: A composer wrote a symphony based on the drakes screeching outside her window. Reviews were mixed—except among the drakes.

name: Never Happened
oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from that player's graveyard or hand and exile it.
flavor_text: Dimir assassins have the precision to slay a single memory.

name: Notion Rain
oracle_text: Surveil 2, then draw two cards. Notion Rain deals 2 damage to you. (To surveil 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)
flavor_text: City air is a constant drizzle of private thoughts.

name: Ornery Goblin
oracle_text: Whenever Ornery Goblin blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, Ornery Goblin deals 1 damage to that creature.
flavor_text: "Nobody ever listens to my complaints! Not even when I use the listening stick."

name: Pack's Favor
oracle_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Selesnya grows its ranks in more ways than one.

name: Parhelion Patrol
oracle_text:
Flying, vigilance
Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)
flavor_text: "Too many have disappeared in these dark days. I am the light that will lead them home."

name: Passwall Adept
oracle_text: {2}{U}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text: "My doors are called trespassing, my signatures, forgeries. They don't respect my talents, and I don't respect their labels."

name: Pause for Reflection
oracle_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

name: Piston-Fist Cyclops
oracle_text:
Defender
As long as you've cast an instant or sorcery spell this turn, Piston-Fist Cyclops can attack as though it didn't have defender.
flavor_text: Its hyperpneumatics can punch through a wall and the spy on the other side.

name: Pitiless Gorgon
oracle_text: Deathtouch
flavor_text: "The reign of the Swarm begins. Let us rise now and dress ourselves in vengeance."

name: Portcullis Vine
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature with defender: Draw a card.
flavor_text: Nature's way of saying "take the long way home."

name: Precision Bolt
oracle_text: Precision Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Ral had wielded lightning all his life but had never harnessed the power of an entire guild.

name: Prey Upon
oracle_text: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
flavor_text:
"Light up the dark to find your way, and the dark may seek you out."
—Zalin the Gutter Bard

name: Radical Idea
oracle_text:
Draw a card.
Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)
flavor_text: Genius is finding the edge of what's possible, then jumping over it.

name: Rhizome Lurcher
oracle_text: Undergrowth — Rhizome Lurcher enters the battlefield with a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.
flavor_text:
"The dead gain new purpose here. What is strange in the eyes of other guilds is harmonious in ours."
—Devesh, Golgari shaman

name: Righteous Blow
oracle_text: Righteous Blow deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor_text:
"The Golgari believe they should be given what they deserve. On this we agree."
—Tajic

name: Rosemane Centaur
oracle_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Vigilance
flavor_text: "I long for peaceful times, when I may tend to my garden instead of our borders."

name: Rubblebelt Boar
oracle_text: When Rubblebelt Boar enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Some Gruul druids believe that boars are spawn of the great Ilharg, the mighty Raze-Boar who will one day rise and level the city.

name: Selesnya Guildgate
oracle_text:
Selesnya Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {W}.
flavor_text:
"Everyone who crosses that threshold is our most cherished friend. Everyone who crosses it again is our bitterest enemy."
—Trostani

name: Selesnya Locket
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {G} or {W}.
{G/W}{G/W}{G/W}{G/W}, {T}, Sacrifice Selesnya Locket: Draw two cards.
flavor_text:
"Think of the locket as a seed you bear, spreading life from Vitu-Ghazi across all of Ravnica."
—Heruj, Selesnya hierophant

name: Severed Strands
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness. Destroy target creature an opponent controls.
flavor_text: "I've seen Ravnica's fate. Believe me, I'm doing you a favor."

name: Siege Wurm
oracle_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Trample
flavor_text: Suddenly, all the haggling didn't seem so important.

name: Skyknight Legionnaire
oracle_text: Flying, haste
flavor_text: Squadrons of skyknights are available for deployment around the clock, capable of reaching any district in the city within minutes.

name: Skyline Scout
oracle_text: Whenever Skyline Scout attacks, you may pay {1}{W}. If you do, it gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Sometimes an angel passes by and gives me a little nod, like, 'You're a daring one!' That always makes my day."

name: Sonic Assault
oracle_text:
Tap target creature. Sonic Assault deals 2 damage to that creature's controller.
Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)
flavor_text: He heard stars and saw thunder.

name: Spinal Centipede
oracle_text: When Spinal Centipede dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
flavor_text: The Golgari adorn themselves with the exoskeletons of iridescent insects. It's only fair the insects do likewise.

name: Sumala Woodshaper
oracle_text: When Sumala Woodshaper enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or enchantment card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

name: Sure Strike
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text: "I packed three more electroconduits into each test wand. You'll experience a brief tingling sensation."

name: Sworn Companions
oracle_text: Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens with lifelink.
flavor_text:
"The trouble with youths these days is that, in outright defiance of their elders, they refuse to be bought."
—Karlov of the Ghost Council

name: Take Heart
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. You gain 1 life for each attacking creature you control.
flavor_text: In the quiet before a battle, Boros soldiers whisper prayers that steady their nerves and focus their minds.

name: Tenth District Guard
oracle_text: When Tenth District Guard enters the battlefield, target creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "The Tenth has always been my home. This city is constantly embroiled in one crisis or another, but I'm determined to protect my piece."

name: Torch Courier
oracle_text:
Haste
Sacrifice Torch Courier: Another target creature gains haste until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Light a torch and deliver this letter" were his instructions, which he unfortunately reversed.

name: Undercity Uprising
oracle_text: Creatures you control gain deathtouch until end of turn. Then target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
flavor_text:
"Now it's your turn to hide."
—Vraska

name: Unexplained Disappearance
oracle_text:
Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)
flavor_text: The first thing the mist chills is the mind. Victims never cry out or even murmur in surprise.

name: Urban Utopia
oracle_text:
Enchant land
When Urban Utopia enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted land has "{T}: Add one mana of any color."
flavor_text: Ravnica's diversity produces blossoms of opinion in a rich soil of perspectives.

name: Vedalken Mesmerist
oracle_text: Whenever Vedalken Mesmerist attacks, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "There's no need to sound the alarm. You are minding your post admirably. I am authorized. All is well."

name: Veiled Shade
oracle_text: {1}{B}: Veiled Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"I sang songs of sorrow for my lost love. Imagine my horror when, one night, they were answered."
—Milana, Orzhov prelate

name: Vernadi Shieldmate
oracle_text: Vigilance
flavor_text: "Selesnya's soil is sacred, and you're about to meet it with your face."

name: Vicious Rumors
oracle_text: Vicious Rumors deals 1 damage to each opponent. Each opponent discards a card, then mills a card. You gain 1 life.
flavor_text:
"The alliances were already frayed. All we do is find the loose threads and pluck."
—Lazav

name: Vigorspore Wurm
oracle_text:
Undergrowth — When Vigorspore Wurm enters the battlefield, target creature gains vigilance and gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard.
Vigorspore Wurm can't be blocked by more than one creature.

name: Wall of Mist
oracle_text: Defender
flavor_text: Fog haunts the streets, rendering the familiar as otherworldly, changing neighbors into shadows, and muffling cries for help.

name: Wary Okapi
oracle_text: Vigilance
flavor_text:
"Be like the grazers of the Saruli. Keep your herd close, and stay alert for encroaching danger."
—Lalia, Selesnya dryad

name: Watcher in the Mist
oracle_text:
Flying
When Watcher in the Mist enters the battlefield, surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

name: Whisper Agent
oracle_text:
Flash
When Whisper Agent enters the battlefield, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)
flavor_text: He has a job to finish, and it's you.

name: Wild Ceratok
flavor_text: Once part of a wealthy merchant's private zoo, the herd roams feral throughout the Tenth, where it will remain until the guilds can agree to relocate, cull, or befriend it.

name: Wishcoin Crab
flavor_text:
"What wishes do they grant? Mostly pinching-related ones."
—Omik, superintendent of waterworks

name: Wojek Bodyguard
oracle_text:
Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)
Wojek Bodyguard can't attack or block alone.
flavor_text: "By all means, take another step toward the captain."
